Socratic Seminar 128

27 Sep 2023 Link to Meetup

Announcements

Please join us for our next Socratic Seminar. A special thank you to our sponsors CardCoins, Chaincode Labs and Wolf NYC for food, refreshments and event space.

If you can’t make it to the main event please join us at PUBKEY around 9:30PM. Learn about this awesome new establishment here.

Mailing Lists, Meetings and Bitcoin Optech

CVEs and Research

Research

InfoSec

  • Don’t overextend your Oblivious Transfer

    • payment_preimage validation is skipped on Android
    • partial MPP might be accepted

Pull Requests and repo updates

Bitcoin Core

  • Fix virtual size limit enforcement in transaction package context
  • Bump unconfirmed ancestor transactions to target feerate
  • validation: fix coins disappearing mid-package evaluation
  • index: coinstats reorg, fail when block cannot be reversed
  • BIP324 connection support
  • Wallet: estimate the size of signed inputs using descriptors
  • blockstorage: Drop legacy -txindex check
  • Update libsecp256k1 subtree to release 0.4.0

BDK

  • Remove TransactionDetails from Wallet API

rust-bitcoin

  • Add Witness::p2wpkh constructor
  • Add transaction::Version data type
  • Feature: Count sigops for Transaction
  • Use newly released bech32 API
  • Script helper to classify bare multisig
  • Feature: Instruction can read the script number
  • Use weight for block size function

Core Lightning

  • Add restriction per for lightningd runes
  • Update to match BOLT master
  • plugin/clnrest: security improvements
  • Update for PR 6657: fix fundchannel infinite loop with tiny UTXOs

eclair

  • Splice with pending committed htlcs
  • Improve startup resource usage
  • Allow splicing on non dual-funded channels
  • Fix tests that expect network minimum feerate to be less than other rates
  • Use bumpforceclose RPC to also bump remote commit fees
  • Fix tx_signatures retransmission
  • Limit how far we look into the blockchain
  • Allow specifying a bitcoin wallet with an empty name
  • Delegate Bitcoin Core’s private key management to Eclair
  • Add RPC to bump local commit fees

LDK

  • BOLT 12 Invoice payments
  • Route blinding MVP
  • Add config option to set maximum total routing fee
  • Batch funding for v1 channel establishments

lnd

  • watchtower: handle rogue updates
  • multi: add ability to specify local nonces for musig2 signer rpc, add itest for remote signer taproot chans
  • lnwallet+contractcourt: gracefully handle auto force close post data …
  • contractcourt: make sure we force sweep outgoing htlcs
